title: 820-2850 dim green light
message:
Hi I recieved this board it had a few issues I replaced isl6259 and tps51125 And a few resistors. Now I have 

PPBUSS_G3H =12.5v
PP5V_S5=5v
PP3v3_S5=3.3v
SMC_ONOFF_L =3.42v
SMC_RESET_L =3.42v 

U5010
PIN 1 PP3V42_G3H_SMC_CLK_F =3.42v
PIN 7 SMC_CLK_R =1.49v ??
Pin 12 PP3V42_G3H_SMC_CLK_F = 3.42v

The logic board will turn on with battery by shorting power on pads but not with charger. Also when it powers on no cpu activity with mouse or usb. PPVCORE_S0_CPU PIN 1 of C1652 =.878v
And CPU gets warm

title: 820-2850 dim green light
message:
Are the mentioned voltages for charger only, no battery?

Be aware, this board only starts with 85W charger, if no battery present.

title: 820-2850 dim green light
message:
Why do insist with DC voltage on a crystal???
If you really want to check it, measure frequency, or check waveform with o-scope.
However, 1.49V points to oscillation is present.

Did you check the power charger reported by an working machine?
Do you still have dim Magsafe light?

Did you check if battery is charging?
Do you get voltage on all big coils?
Do you note VCORE droping from 1.1V to 0.85V after few seconds?

title: 820-2850 dim green light
message:
VCORE change looks like board tries to boot.
At least PCH read BIOS and adjust the voltage.

GPU voltages appear too?
Did you change C9560?

BTW, I suppose you meant 0.859 instead of 8.59...

title: 820-2850 dim green light
message:
Yes I meant .859v 
replaced C9560 that was the first thing I changed after tps and isl6259
On L8920 =.985v PPVCORE_GPU_REG_R

title: 820-2850 dim green light
message:
Let the board on with battery alone for 15-30 min; then check again if charging.
11.22V is almost full charge.

Did you use hot air to replace C9560?
Is not a good idea at all; heat can affect other things.

title: 820-2850 dim green light
message:

Also, I just checked PP3v3_S3  and something just started pulling down my PP3v3_S3 line.  I had solid s3/s5 lines I’m sure of it. Now it’s .731v :( 
I will get s3 lines up again and let you know if it charges

title: 820-2850 dim green light
message: ok so what I’ve found with battery disconnected I have to hold the power pads down for 2-3 seconds and the PP3v3_S3 line comes up to 3.3v with out battery. I don’t have PP5v_S0  When this happens and I mean nothing not even trying to start. Shouldn’t this board power on when a mage safe is connected ?
